item.title: 配置帮助
item.description: Page being translated from English to Chinese. Do you speak Chinese? Help us to translate it by sending us pull requests! The help commands display information based on the current code implementation. Hence, it will provide accurate information in case the documentation is not updated. It is the easiest way to learn about Grid 4 configuration for any new version. Info Command The info command provides detailed docs on the following topics:
